quotes.name: The Stranger
quotes.text: A way out west there was a fella, fella I want to tell you about, fella by the name of Jeff Lebowski.  At least, that was the handle his lovin' parents gave him, but he never had much use for it himself.  This Lebowski, he called himself the Dude. Now, Dude, that's a name no one would self-apply where I come from.  But then, there was a lot about the Dude that didn't make a whole lot of sense to me.  And a lot about where he lived, like- wise.  But then again, maybe that's why I found the place s'durned innarestin'.

quotes.name: The Stranger
quotes.text: They call Los Angeles the City of Angels. I didn't find it to be that exactly, but I'll allow as there are some nice folks there. 'Course, I can't say I seen London, and I never been to France, and I ain't never seen no queen in her damn undies as the fella says. But I'll tell you what, after seeing Los Angeles and thisahere story I'm about to unfold-- wal, I guess I seen somethin' ever' bit as stupefyin' as ya'd see in any a those other places, and in English too, so I can die with a smile on my face without feelin' like the good Lord gypped me.

quotes.name: The Stranger
quotes.text: Now this story I'm about to unfold took place back in the early nineties-- just about the time of our conflict with Sad'm and the Eye-rackies. I only mention it 'cause some- times there's a man--I won't say a hee-ro, 'cause what's a hee-ro?--but sometimes there's a man.

quotes.name: The Stranger
quotes.text: And I'm talkin' about the Dude here-- sometimes there's a man who, wal, he's the man for his time'n place, he fits right in there--and that's the Dude, in Los Angeles.

quotes.name: The Stranger
quotes.text: ...and even if he's a lazy man, and the Dude was certainly that--quite possibly the laziest in Los Angeles County.

quotes.name: The Stranger

And he has the wealth, uh, the resources obviously, and there is no reason, no FUCKING reason, why his wife should go out and owe money and they pee on your rug. Am I wrong?

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.text: Okay sir, you're a Lebowski, I'm a Lebowski, that's terrific, I'm very busy so what can I do for you?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Well sir, it's this rug I have, really tied the room together-

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Well they were looking for you, these two guys, they were trying to--

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: I'll say it again, all right? You told Brandt. He told me. I know what happened. Yes? Yes?

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: Hello! Hello! So every time--I just want to understand this, sir-- every time a rug is micturated upon in this fair city, I have to compensate the--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Come on, man, I'm not trying to scam anybody here, I'm just--

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: You're just looking for a handout like every other--are you employed, Mr. Lebowski?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Look, let me explain something. I'm not Mr. Lebowski; you're Mr. Lebowski. I'm the Dude. So that's what you call me. That, or Duder. His Dudeness. Or El Duderino, if, you know, you're not into the whole brevity thing--

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: Are you employed, sir?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Employed?

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: You don't go out and make a living dressed like that in the middle of a weekday.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Is this a--what day is this?

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: But I do work, so if you don't mind--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: No, look. I do mind. The Dude minds. This will not stand, ya know, this will not stand, man. I mean, if your wife owes--

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: My wife is not the issue here. I hope that my wife will someday learn to live on her allowance, which is ample, but if she doesn't, sir, that will be her problem, not mine, just as your rug is your problem, just as every bum's lot in life is his own responsibility regardless of whom he chooses to blame.  I didn't blame anyone for the loss of my legs, some chinaman in Korea took them from me but I went out and achieved anyway. I can't solve your problems, sir, only you can.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Ah fuck it.

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: Sure! Fuck it! That's your answer! Tattoo it on your forehead! Your answer to everything! Your revolution is over, Mr. Lebowski! Condolences! The bums lost! ...My advice is, do what your parents did! Get a job, sir! The bums will always lose-- do you hear me, Lebowski? THE BUMS WILL ALWAYS--

quotes.text: What do you mean 'brought it bowling'? I didn't rent it shoes. I'm not buying it a fucking beer. He's not gonna take your fucking turn, Dude.

quotes.text: Hey, man, if my fucking ex-wife asked me to take care of her fucking dog while she and her boyfriend went to Honolulu, I'd tell her to go fuck herself.  Why can't she board it?

quotes.text: First of all, Dude, you don't have an ex, secondly, it's a fucking show dog with fucking papers. You can't board it. It gets upset, its hair falls out.

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Fucking dog has papers, Dude.--Over the line! Smokey Huh? Over the line, Smokey! I'm sorry. That's a foul.

quotes.text: Excuse me! Mark it zero. Next frame.

quotes.text: This is not Nam. This is bowling. There are rules.

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.name: Smokey

quotes.name: Walter

quotes.name: Smokey
quotes.text: Walter--

quotes.name: Walter

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: This is a league game, Smokey!

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: You know Dude, I myself dabbled with pacifism at one point.  Not in Nam, of course--

quotes.text: And you know Smokey has emotional problems!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: You mean--beyond pacifism?

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Huh. I did not know that. Well, it's water under the bridge. And we do enter the next round-robin, am I wrong?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: No, you're not wrong--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Am I wrong!

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.name: Walter

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Just, just take it easy, Walter.

quotes.name: Walter

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Well, just take 't easy, man.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: I'm perfectly calm, Dude.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah?  Wavin' a gun around?!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Calmer than you are.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Just take it easy, man!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Calmer than you are.

quotes.name: Smokey
quotes.text: Dude, this is Smokey. Look, I don't wanna be a hard-on about this, and I know it wasn't your fault, but I just thought it was fair to tell you that Gene and I will be submitting this to the League and asking them to set aside the round.  Or maybe forfeit it to us--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Shit!

quotes.name: Smokey
quotes.text: --so, like I say, just thought, you know, fair warning.  Tell Walter.

quotes.name: Brandt
quotes.text: Mr. Lebowski, this is Brandt at, uh, well--at Mr. Lebowski's office. Please call us as soon as is convenient.

quotes.name: Fred Dynarski
quotes.text: Mr. Lebowski, this is with the Southern Cal Bowling League. I just got a, an informal report, uh, that a uh, a member of your team, uh, Walter Sobchak, drew a loaded weapon during league play--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Hiya Marty.

quotes.name: Marty
quotes.text: Dude, I finally got the venue I wanted.  I'm Performing my dance quintet--you know, my cycle--at Crane Jackson's Fountain Street Theatre on Tuesday night, and I'd love it if you came and gave me notes.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Sure Marty, I'll be there.

quotes.name: Marty
quotes.text: Dude, uh, tomorrow is already the tenth.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah, yeah I know. Okay.

quotes.name: Marty
quotes.text: Just, uh, just slip the rent under my door.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah, okay.

quotes.name: Brandt
quotes.text: Mr. Lebowski, Brandt again.  Please do call us when you get in and I'll send the limo.  Let me assure you--I hope you're not avoiding this call because of the rug, which, I assure you, is not a problem.  We need your help and, uh--well we would very much like to see you.  Thank you. It's Brandt.

quotes.name: Brandt
quotes.text: We've had some terrible news. Mr. Lebowski is in seclusion in the West Wing. Mr. Lebowski.

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: It's funny.  I can look back on a life of achievement, on challenges met, competitors bested, obstacles overcome.  I've accomplished more than most men, and without the use of my legs.  What. . . What makes a man, Mr. Lebowski?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Dude.

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: Huh?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: I don't know, sir.

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: Is it. . . is it, being prepared to do the right thing? Whatever the price? Isn't that what makes a man?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Sure. That and a pair of testicles.

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: You're joking. But perhaps you're right.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Mind if I smoke a jay?

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: Bunny Lebowski. . . She is the light of my life. Are you surprised at my tears, sir?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Fuckin' A.

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: Strong men also cry. . . Strong men also cry. I received this fax this morning. As you can see, it is a ransom note. Sent by cowards.  Men who are unable to achieve on a level field of play. Men who will not sign their names. Weaklings. Bums.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Bummer.

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: Brandt will fill you in on the details.

quotes.name: Brandt

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Why me, man?

quotes.name: Brandt
quotes.text: He suspects that the culprits might be the very people who, uh, soiled your rug, and you're in a unique position to confirm or, uh, disconfirm that suspicion.

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.name: Brandt
quotes.text: Well Dude, we just don't know.

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Yeah, but he's a fucking pervert, Dude.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Huh?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: The man is a sex offender. With a record. Spent six months in Chino for exposing himself to an eight-year-old.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Huh.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: When he moved down to Venice he had to go door-to-door to tell everyone he's a pederast.

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: What's a pederast, Walter?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Shut the fuck up, Donny.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Anyway. How much they offer you?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Twenty grand. And of course I still keep the rug.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Just for making the hand-off?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: ...They gave Dude a beeper, so whenever these guys call--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: What if it's during a game?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: I told him if it was during league play--

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: If what's during league play?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Life does not stop and start at your convenience, you miserable piece of shit.

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: What's wrong with Walter, Dude?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: I figure it's easy money, it's all pretty harmless. I mean she probably kidnapped herself.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Huh?

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: What do you mean, Dude?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Rug-peers did not do this. I mean look at it. Young trophy wife. Marries a guy for money but figures he isn't giving her enough. She owes money all over town--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: That...fucking...bitch!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: It's all a goddamn fake. Like Lenin said, look for the person who will benefit. And you will, uh, you know, you'll, uh, you know what I'm trying to say--

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: I am the Walrus.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: That fucking bitch!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah.

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: I am the Walrus.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Shut the fuck up, Donny! V.I. Lenin! Vladimir Ilyich Ulyanov!

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: What the fuck is he talking about?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: That's fucking exactly what happened, Dude! That makes me fucking SICK!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah, well, what do you care, Walter?

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: Yeah Dude, why is Walter so pissed off?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Those rich fucks! This whole fucking thing-- I did not watch my buddies die face down in the muck so that this fucking strumpet--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: I don't see any connection to Vietnam, Walter.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Well, there isn't a literal connection, Dude.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Walter, face it, there isn't any connection. It's your roll.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Have it your way. The point is--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: It's your roll--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: The fucking point is--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: It's your roll.

quotes.name: The Jesus
quotes.text: Are you ready to be fucked, man?

quotes.name: The Jesus
quotes.text: I see you rolled your way into the semis. Deos mio, man. Seamus and me, we're gonna fuck you up.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah well, that's just, ya know, like, your opinion, man.

quotes.name: The Jesus
quotes.text: Let me tell you something, bendeco. You pull any your crazy shit with us, you flash a piece out on the lanes, I'll take it away from you and stick it up your ass and pull the fucking trigger til it goes 'click'.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Jesus.

quotes.name: The Jesus
quotes.text: You said it, man. Nobody fucks with the Jesus.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Eight-year-olds, Dude.

quotes.name: Brandt
quotes.text: They called about eighty minutes ago. They want you to take the money and drive north on the 4 5. They'll call you on the portable phone with instructions in about forty minutes. One person only or I'd go with you. They were very clear on that: one person only.  What happened to your jaw?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Oh, nothin', you know.

quotes.name: Brandt
quotes.text: Here's the money, and the phone. Please, Dude, follow whatever instructions they give.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Uh-huh.

quotes.name: Brandt
quotes.text: Her life is in your hands.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Oh, man, don't say that..

quotes.name: Brandt
quotes.text: Mr. Lebowski asked me to repeat that: Her life is in your hands.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Shit.

quotes.name: Brandt
quotes.text: Her life is in your hands, Dude. And report back to us as soon as it's done.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Take the ringer.  I'll drive.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: The what?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: The ringer!  The ringer, Dude!  Have they called yet?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: What the hell is this?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: My dirty undies. Laundry, Dude. The whites.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Agh--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Walter, I'm sure there's a reason you brought your dirty undies--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Thaaaat's right, Dude. The weight. The ringer cannot look empty.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Walter--what the fuck are you thinking?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Well you're right, Dude, I got to thinking. I got to thinking why should we settle for a measly fucking twenty grand--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: We? What the fuck we? You said you just wanted to come along--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: My point, Dude, is why should we settle for twenty grand when we can keep the entire million. Am I wrong?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yes you're wrong. This isn't a fucking game, Walter--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: It is a fucking game. You said so yourself, Dude--she kidnapped herself--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah, but--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Dude here.

quotes.name: Uli Kunkel
quotes.text: Who is this?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Dude the Bagman. Where do you want us to go?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Shit. . . Uh, yeah, you know, me and the driver. I'm not handling the money and driving the car and talking on the phone all by my fucking--

quotes.name: Uli Kunkel
quotes.text: Shut the fuck up. Hello?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah?

quotes.name: Uli Kunkel
quotes.text: Okay, listen--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Dude, are you fucking this up?

quotes.name: Uli Kunkel
quotes.text: Who is that?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: The driver man, I told you--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Oh shit.  Walter.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: What the fuck is going on there?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: They hung up, Walter! You fucked it up! You fucked it up! Her life was in our hands!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Easy, Dude.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: We're screwed now! We don't get shit and they're gonna kill her! We're fucked, Walter!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Dude, nothing is fucked. Come on. You're being very unDude. They'll call back. Look, she kidnapped her--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Ya see? Nothing is fucked up here, Dude. Nothing is fucked. These guys are fucking amateurs--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Shutup, Walter! Don't say peep when I'm doing business here.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Okay Dude. Have it your way. But they're amateurs.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Dude here.

quotes.name: Uli Kunkel
quotes.text: Okay, vee proceed. But only if there is no funny stuff.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah.

quotes.name: Uli Kunkel
quotes.text: So no funny stuff. Okay?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Hey, just tell me where the fuck you want us to go.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: That was the sign.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Yeah. So as long as we get her back, nobody's in a position to complain. And we keep the baksheesh.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Terrific, Walter. But you haven't told me how we get her back. Where is she?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: That's the simple part, Dude. When we make the handoff, I grab the guy and beat it out of him.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: ...Huh?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah. That's a great plan, Walter. That's fucking ingenious, if I understand it correctly. That's a Swiss fucking watch.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Thaaat's right, Dude. The beauty of this is its simplicity. If the plan gets too complex something always goes wrong.  If there's one thing I learned in Nam--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Dude.

quotes.name: Uli Kunkel
quotes.text: You are approaching a vooden britch. When you cross it you srow ze bag from ze left vindow of ze moving kar.  Do not slow down.  Vee vatch you.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: FUCK.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: What'd he say? Where's the hand- off?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: There is no fucking hand-off, Walter! At a Wooden bridge we throw the money out  of the car!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Huh?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: We throw the money out of the moving car!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: We can't do that, Dude.  That fucks up our plan.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Well call them up and explain it to 'em, Walter!  Your plan is so fucking simple, I'm sure they'd fucking understand it!  That's the beauty of it Walter!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Wooden bridge, huh?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: I'm throwing the money, Walter! We're not fucking around!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: The bridge is coming up!  Gimme the ringer, Dude!  Chop-chop!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Fuck that!  I love you, Walter, but sooner or later you're gonna have to face the fact that you're a goddamn moron.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Okay, Dude.  No time to argue.  Here's the bridge--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Walter!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Your wheel, Dude!  I'm rolling out!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: What the fuck?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Your wheel!  At fifteen em-pee-aitch I roll out!  I double back, grab one of 'em and beat it out of him!  The uzi!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Uzi?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: You didn't think I was rolling out of here naked!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Walter, please--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Fifteen!  This is it, Dude!  Let's take that hill!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: WE HAVE IT!  WE HAVE IT!!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: WE HAVE IT!!. . . We have it!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Ahh fuck it, let's go bowling.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Aitz chaim he, Dude.  As the ex used to say.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: What the fuck is that supposed to mean?  What the fuck're we gonna tell Lebowski?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Huh?  Oh, him, yeah.  Well I don't see, um-- what exactly is the problem?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Huh?  The problem is--what do you mean what's the--there's no--we didn't-- they're gonna kill that poor woman--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: What the fuck're you talking about? That poor woman--that poor slut-- kidnapped herself, Dude.  You said so yourself--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: No, Walter!  I said I thought she kidnapped herself!  You're the one who's so fucking certain--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: That's right, Dude, 100% certain--

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: They posted the next round of the tournament--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Donny, shut the f--when do we play?

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: This Saturday.  Quintana and--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Saturday!  Well they'll have to reschedule.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Walter, what'm I gonna tell Lebowski?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: I told that fuck down at the league office-- who's in charge of scheduling?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Walter--

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: Burkhalter.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: I told that kraut a fucking thousand times I don't roll on shabbas.

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: It's already posted.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: WELL THEY CAN FUCKING UN-POST IT!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Who gives a shit, Walter?  What about that poor woman?  What do we tell--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: C'mon Dude, eventually she'll get sick of her little game and, you know, wander back--

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: How come you don't roll on Saturday, Walter?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: I'm shomer shabbas.

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: What's that, Walter?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah, and in the meantime what do I tell Lebowski?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Saturday is shabbas.  Jewish day of rest.  Means I don't work, I don't drive a car, I don't fucking ride in a car, I don't handle money, I don't turn on the oven, and I sure as shit don't fucking roll!

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: Sheesh.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Walter, how--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Shomer shabbas.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: That's it.  I'm out of here.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: For Christ's sake, Dude. Hell, you just tell him--well, you tell him, uh, we made the hand-off, everything went, uh, you know--

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: Oh yeah, how'd it go?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Went alright.  Dude's car got a little dinged up--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: But Walter, we didn't make the fucking hand- off!  They didn't get, the fucking money and they're gonna-- they're gonna--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Yeah yeah, 'kill that poor woman.'

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Kill that poor woman.

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: Walter, if you can't ride in a car, how d'you get around on Shammas--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Really, Dude, you surprise me. They're not gonna kill shit.  They're not gonna do shit.  What can they do?  Fuckin' amateurs.  And meanwhile, look at the bottom line.  Who's sitting on a million fucking dollars? Am I wrong?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Walter--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Who's got a fucking million fucking dollars parked in the trunk of our car out here?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: 'Our' car, Walter?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: And what do they got, Dude?  My dirty undies.  My fucking whites--Say, where is  the car?

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: Who has your undies, Walter?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Where's your car, Dude?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: You don't know, Walter?  You seem to know the answer to everything else!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Hmm.  Well, we were in a handicapped spot.  It, uh, it was probably towed.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: It's been stolen, Walter!  You fucking know it's been stolen!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Well, certainly that's a possibility, Dude--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Aw, fuck it.

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: Where you going, Dude?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: I'm going home, Donny.

quotes.name: Donny
quotes.text: Your phone's ringing, Dude.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Thank you, Donny.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: 1972 Pontiac LeBaron.

quotes.name: Younger Cop
quotes.text: Color?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Green.  Some brown, or, uh, rust, coloration.

quotes.name: Younger Cop
quotes.text: And was there anything of value in the car?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Huh?  Oh.  Yeah.  Tape deck.  Couple of Creedence tapes.  And there was a, uh. . . my briefcase.

quotes.name: Younger Cop
quotes.text: In the briefcase?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Papers.  Just papers.  You know, my papers.  Business papers.

quotes.name: Younger Cop
quotes.text: And what do you do, sir?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: I'm unemployed.

quotes.name: Older Cop
quotes.text: ...Most people, we're working nights, they offer us coffee.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: ...Me, I don't drink coffee. But it's nice when they offer. ...Also, my rug was stolen.

quotes.name: Younger Cop
quotes.text: Your rug was in the car.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: No.  Here.

quotes.name: Younger Cop
quotes.text: Separate incidents?

quotes.name: Older Cop
quotes.text: Snap out of it, son.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: You find them much?  Stolen cars?

quotes.name: Younger Cop
quotes.text: Sometimes.  I wouldn't hold out much hope for the tape deck though.  Or the Creedence tapes.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: And the, uh, the briefcase?

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Mr. Lebowski, I'd like to see you. Call when you get home and I'll send a car for you.  My name is Maude Lebowski.  I'm the woman who took the rug.

quotes.name: Older Cop
quotes.text: Well, I guess we can close the file on that one.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: I'll be with you in a minute, Mr. Lebowski. Does the female form make you uncomfor- table, Mr. Lebowski?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Is that what that's a picture of?

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: In a sense, yes.  Elfranco, my robe. My art has been commended as being strongly vaginal.  Which bothers some men.  The word itself makes some men uncomfortable.  Vagina.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Oh yeah?

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Yes, they don't like hearing it and find it difficult to say.  Whereas without batting an eye a man will refer to his 'dick' or his 'rod' or his 'Johnson'.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: 'Johnson'?

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Thank you. All right, Mr. Lebowski, let's get down to cases.  My father told me he's agreed to let you have the rug, but it was a gift from me to my late mother, and so was not his to give. Now.  As for this. . . 'kidnapping'--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Huh?

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Yes, I know about it. And I know that you acted as courier. And let me tell you something: the whole thing stinks to high heaven.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Right, but let me explain something about that rug--

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Do you like sex, Mr. Lebowski?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Excuse me?

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Sex. The physical act of love. Coitus. Do you like it?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: I was talking about my rug.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: You're not interested in sex?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: You mean coitus?

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: I like it too. It's a male myth about feminists that we hate sex. It can be a natural, zesty enterprise. But unfortunately there are some people--it is called satyriasis in men, nymphomania in women--who engage in it compulsively and without joy.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Oh, no.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Yes Mr. Lebowski, these unfortunate souls cannot love in the true sense of the word. Our mutual acquaintance Bunny is one of these.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Listen, Maude, I'm sorry if your stepmother is a nympho, but I don't see what it has to do with--do you have any kalhua?

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Take a look at this, sir.

quotes.name: Uli Kunkel
quotes.text: Hello. Nein dizbatcher says zere iss problem mit deine kable.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Shit, I know that guy. He's a nihilist.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: And you recognize her, of course.

quotes.name: Uli Kunkel
quotes.text: Za, okay, I bring mein toolz.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: The story is ludicrous.

quotes.name: Uli Kunkel
quotes.text: Mein nommen iss Karl.  Is hard to verk in zese clozes--

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Lord. You can imagine where it goes from here.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: He fixes the cable?

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Don't be fatuous, Jeffrey.  Little matter to me that this woman chose to pursue a career in pornography, nor that she has been 'banging' Jackie Treehorn, to use the parlance of our times.  However.  I am one of two trustees of the Lebowski Foundation, the other being my father.  The Foundation takes youngsters from Watts and--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Shit yeah, the achievers.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Little Lebowski Urban Achievers, yes, and proud we are of all of them. I asked my father about his withdrawal of a million dollars from the Foundation account and he told me about this 'abduction', but I tell you it is preposterous.  This compulsive fornicator is taking my father for the proverbial ride.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah, but my-

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: I'm getting to your rug. My father and I don't get along; he doesn't approve of my lifestyle and, needless to say, I don't approve of his. Still, I hardly wish to make my father's embezzlement a police matter, so I'm proposing that you try to recover the money from the people you delivered it to.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Well--sure, I could do that--

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: If you successfully do so, I will compensate you to the tune of 10% of the recovered sum.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: A hundred.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Thousand, yes, bones or clams or whatever you call them.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah, but what about--

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: --your rug, yes, well with that money you can buy any number of rugs that don't have sentimental value for me. And I am sorry about that crack on the jaw.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Oh that's okay, I hardly even--

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Here's the name and number of a doctor who will look at it for you. You will receive no bill. He's a good man, and thorough.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: That's really thoughtful but I--

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Please see him, Jeffrey. He's a good man, and thorough.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Fuckin' A, man. I got a rash. Fuckin' A, man. I gotta tell ya Tony. I was feeling really shitty earlier in the day, I'd lost  a little  money, I  was down in the dumps.

quotes.name: Tony
quotes.text: Aw, forget about it.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah, man! Fuck it! I can't be worrying about that shit. Life goes on!

quotes.text: Home sweet home, Mr. L. Who's your friend in the Volkswagon?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Huh?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: When did he-

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Fuck, man!  There's a beverage here!

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: Start talking and talk fast you lousy bum!

quotes.name: Brandt
quotes.text: We've been frantically trying to reach you, Dude.

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: Where's my goddamn money, you bum?!

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.text: I've heard the kidnapping story, so save it.  I know you're mixed up in all this, Dude, and I don't care what you're trying to take off her husband.  That's your business.  All I'm saying is, I want mine.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah, well, right man, there are many facets to this, uh, you know, many interested parties.  If I can find your money, man-- what's in it for the Dude?

quotes.name: Jackie Treehorn
quotes.text: Of course, there's that to discuss. Refill?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Does the Pope shit in the Woods?

quotes.name: Jackie Treehorn
quotes.text: Let's say a 10% finder's fee?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Okay, Jackie, done. I like the way you do business.  Your money is being held by a kid named Larry Sellers. He lives in North HollyWood, on Radford, near the In-and-Out Burger. A real fuckin' brat, but I'm sure your goons'll be able to get it off him, mean he's only fifteen and he's flunking social studies.  So if you'll just write me a check for my ten per cent. . . of half a million. . . fifty grand.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: I'll go out and mingle.--Jesus, you mix a hell of a Caucasian, Jackie.

quotes.name: Jackie Treehorn
quotes.text: A fifteen-year-old? Is this your idea of a joke?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: No funny stuff, Jackie. . . the kid's got it.  Hiya, fellas. . . kid just wanted a car.  All the Dude ever wanted. . . was his rug back. . . not greedy. . . it really.

quotes.name: The Stranger
quotes.text: Darkness warshed over the Dude-- darker'n a black steer's tookus on a moonless prairie night.  There was no bottom.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: He was innocent. Not a charge was true. And they say he ran awaaaaaay.

quotes.name: Police Chief of Malibu
quotes.text: This is your only I.D.?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: I know my rights.

quotes.name: Police Chief of Malibu
quotes.text: You don't know shit, Lebowski.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: I want a fucking lawyer, man.  I want Bill Kunstler.

quotes.name: Police Chief of Malibu
quotes.text: What are you, some kind of sad-assed refugee from the fucking sixties?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Uh-huh.

quotes.name: Police Chief of Malibu
quotes.text: Mr. Treehorn tells us that he had to eject you from his garden party, that you were drunk and abusive.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: That guy treats women like objects, man.

quotes.name: Police Chief of Malibu
quotes.text: Mr. Treehorn draws a lot of water in this town, Lebowski.  You don't draw shit.  We got a nice quiet beach community here, and I aim to keep it nice and quiet.  So let me make something plain.  I don't like you sucking around bothering our citizens, Lebowski.  I don't like your jerk- off name, I don't like your jerk-off face, I don't like your jerk- off behavior, and I don't like you, jerk- off --do I make myself clear?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: I'm sorry, I wasn't listening.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: --Ow!  Fucking fascist!

quotes.name: Police Chief of Malibu
quotes.text: Stay out of Malibu, Lebowski!

quotes.name: Police Chief of Malibu
quotes.text: Stay out of Malibu, deadbeat!  Keep your ugly fucking goldbricking ass out of my beach community!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Jesus, man, can you change the station?

quotes.name: Cab Driver
quotes.text: Fuck you man!  You don't like my fucking music, get your own fucking cab!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: I've had a--

quotes.name: Cab Driver
quotes.text: I pull over and kick your ass out, man!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: --had a rough night, and I hate the fucking Eagles, man--

quotes.name: Cab Driver
quotes.text: That's it!  Outta this fucking cab!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Jesus.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Jeffrey.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Maude?

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Love me.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: That's my robe.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Tell me a little about yourself, Jeffrey.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Well, uh. . . Not much to tell.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: I was, uh, one of the authors of the Port Huron Statement.--The original Port Huron Statement.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Uh-huh.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Not the compromised second draft. And then I, uh. . . Ever hear of the Seattle Seven?

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Mmnun.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: And then. . . let's see, I uh--music business briefly.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Oh?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah.  Roadie for Metallica.  Speed of Sound Tour.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Uh-huh.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Bunch of assholes.  And then, you know, little of this, little of that. My career's, uh, slowed down a bit lately.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: What do you do for fun?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Oh, you know, the usual.  Bowl. Drive around.  The occasional acid flashback.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: What happened to your house?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Jackie Treehorn trashed the place. Wanted to save the finder's fee.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Finder's fee?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: He thought I had your father's money, so he got me out of the way while he looked for it.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: It's not my father's money, it's the Foundation's.  Why did he think you had it?  And who does?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Larry Sellers, a high-school kid. Real fucking brat.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Jeffrey--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: It's a complicated case, Maude. Lotta ins, lotta outs.  Fortunately I've been adhering to a pretty strict, uh, drug regimen to keep my mind, you know, limber.  I'm real fucking close to your father's money, real fucking close.  It's just--

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: I keep telling you, it's the Foundation's money.  Father doesn't have any.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Huh?  He's fucking loaded.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: No no, the wealth was all Mother's.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: But your father--he runs stuff, he--

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: We did let Father run one of the companies, briefly, but he didn't do very well at it.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: But he's--

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: He helps administer the charities now, and I give him a reasonable allowance.  He has no money of his own.  I know how he likes to present himself; Father's weakness is vanity. Hence the slut.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Huh.  Jeez.  Well, so, did he--is that yoga?

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: It increases the chances of conception.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Increases?

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Well yes, what did you think this was all about?  Fun and games?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Well...no, of course not--

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: I want a child.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah, okay, but see, the Dude--

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Look, Jeffrey, I don't want a partner. In fact I don't want the father to be someone I have to see socially, or who'll have any interest in rearing the child himself.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Huh...

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: So...that doctor.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: Exactly.  What happened to your face? Did Jackie Treehorn do that as well?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: No, the, uh, police chief of Malibu. A real reactionary. . . So your father. . . Oh man, I get it!

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: What?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah, my thinking about the case, man, it had become uptight.  Yeah. Your father--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: This is Walter Sobchak.  I'm not in; leave a message after the beep.

quotes.name: Maude Lebowski
quotes.text: What're you talking about?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Walter, if you're there, pick up the fucking phone.  Pick it up, Walter, this is an emergency.  I'm not--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Dude?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Walter, listen, I'm at my place, I need you to come pick me up--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: I can't drive, Dude, it's erev shabbas.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Huh?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Erev shabbas. I can't drive. I'm not even supposed to pick up the phone, unless it's an emergency.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: It is a fucking emergency.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: I understand.  That's why I picked up the phone.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: THEN WHY CAN'T YOU--fuck, never mind, just call Donny then, and ask him to--

quotes.text: Dude, I'm not supposed to make calls--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: WALTER, YOU FUCKING ASSHOLE, WE GOTTA GO TO PASADENA!  COME  PICK ME UP OR I'M OFF THE FUCKING BOWLING TEAM!

quotes.text: Jeffrey?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Get out of that fucking car, man!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Who the fuck are you, man! Come on, man!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Who the fuck are you?  Why've you been following me?  Come on, fuckhead!

quotes.text: A dick, man!  And let me tell you something: I dig your work. Playing one side against the other--in bed with everybody--fabulous stuff, man.

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.text: The Gundersons.  It's a wandering daughter job.  Bunny Lebowski, man. Her real name is Fawn Gunderson. Her parents want her back.

quotes.text: See?

quotes.text: Jesus fucking Christ.

quotes.text: Fuck, man!  That's terrible!

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.text: I mean we totally fucked it up, man. We fucked up his pay-off.  And got the kidnappers all pissed off, and the big Lebowski yelled at me a lot, but he didn't do anything.  Huh?

quotes.name: Walter

quotes.text: I'm saying if he knows I'm a fuck- up, then why does he still leave me in charge of getting back his wife? Because he fucking doesn't want her back, man!  He's had enough!  He no longer digs her!  It's all a show! But then, why didn't he give a shit about his million bucks?  I mean, he knew we didn't hand off his briefcase, but he never asked for it back.

quotes.text: Yeah?

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Huh?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: I'm saying, I see what you're getting at, Dude, he kept the money, but my point is, here we are, it's shabbas, the sabbath, which I'm allowed to break only if it's a matter of life and death--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Walter, come off it.  You're not even fucking Jewish, you're--

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.text: You know this!

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.name: Walter

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: This driveway.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: I'm as Jewish as fucking Tevye

quotes.name: The Dude

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Jesus Christ.

quotes.name: Walter

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: We know the briefcase was empty, man. We know you kept the million bucks yourself.

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: Well, you have your story, I have mine. I say I entrusted the money to you, and you stole it.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: AS IF WE WOULD EVER DREAM OF TAKING YOUR BULLSHIT MONEY!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: You thought Bunny'd been kidnapped and you could use it as a pretext to make some money disappear.  All you needed was a sap to pin it on, and you'd just met me.  You thought, hey, a deadbeat, a loser, someone the square community won't give a shit about.

quotes.name: Lebowski

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Well. . . yeah.

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: All right, get out.  Both of you.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Look at that fucking phony, Dude! Pretending to be a fucking millionaire!

quotes.name: Lebowski
quotes.text: I said out.  Now.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Let me tell you something else. I've seen a lot of spinals, Dude, and this guy is a fake. A fucking goldbricker.

quotes.text: Oh, shit.

quotes.text: You monsters!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Shit, sorry man.

quotes.text: Walter, you fuck!

quotes.text: Shit, Dude, I didn't know. I wouldn't've done it if I knew he was a fucking crybaby.

quotes.name: The Dude

I would've fucked you in the ass Saturday, I'll fuck you in the ass next Wednesday instead!

quotes.text: It's a heart attack.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Wha.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Call the medics, Dude.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Wha. . . Donny--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Hurry Dude. I'd go but I'm pumping blood. Might pass out.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Rest easy, good buddy, you're doing fine. We got help choppering in.

quotes.name: Donnelly
quotes.text: Hello, gentlemen. You are the bereaved?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah man.

quotes.name: Donnelly
quotes.text: Francis Donnelly. Pleased to meet you.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Jeffrey Lebowski.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Walter Sobchak.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: The Dude, actually. Is what, uh.

quotes.name: Donnelly
quotes.text: Excuse me?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Nothing.

quotes.name: Donnelly
quotes.text: Yes. I understand you're taking away the remains.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Yeah.

quotes.name: Donnelly
quotes.text: We have the urn.

quotes.name: Donnelly
quotes.text: And I assume this is credit card?

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Yeah.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: What's this?

quotes.name: Donnelly
quotes.text: That is for the urn.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Don't need it.  We're scattering the ashes.

quotes.name: Donnelly
quotes.text: Yes, so we were informed. However, we must of course transmit the remains to you in a receptacle.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: This is a hundred and eighty dollars.

quotes.name: Donnelly
quotes.text: Yes sir.  It is our most modestly priced receptacle.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Well can we--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: A hundred and eighty dollars?!

quotes.name: Donnelly
quotes.text: They range up to three thousand.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Yeah, but we're--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Can we just rent it from you?

quotes.name: Donnelly
quotes.text: Sir, this is a mortuary, not a rental house.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: We're scattering the fucking ashes!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Walter--

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: JUST BECAUSE WE'RE BEREAVED DOESN'T MEAN WE'RE SAPS!

quotes.name: Donnelly
quotes.text: Sir, please lower your voice--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Hey man, don't you have something else you could put it in?

quotes.name: Donnelly
quotes.text: That is our most modestly priced receptacle.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: GODDAMNIT!  IS THERE A RALPH'S AROUND HERE?!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: I'll say a few words.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Donny was a good bowler, and a good man. He was. . . He was one of us. He was a man who loved the outdoors, and bowling, and as a surfer explored the beaches of southern California from Redondo to Calabassos.  And he was an avid bowler.  And a good friend.  He died--he died as so many of his generation, before his time. In your wisdom you took him, Lord. As you took so many bright flowering young men, at Khe San and Lan Doc and Hill 364.  These young men gave their lives.  And Donny too.  Donny who. . . who loved bowling.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: And so, Theodore--Donald--Karabotsos, in accordance with what we think your dying wishes might well have been, we commit your mortal remains to the bosom of the Pacific Ocean, which you loved so well.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Goodnight, sweet prince.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Shit, I'm sorry Dude.

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Goddamn wind.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Goddamnit Walter! You fucking asshole!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Dude! Dude, I'm sorry!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: You make everything a fucking travesty!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Dude, I'm--it was an accident!

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: What about that shit about Vietnam!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Dude, I'm sorry--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: What the fuck does Vietnam have to do with anything! What the fuck were you talking about?!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Shit Dude, I'm sorry--

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: You're a fuck, Walter!

quotes.name: Walter
quotes.text: Awww, fuck it Dude.  Let's go bowling.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Two oat sodas, Gary.

quotes.name: Gary
quotes.text: Right.  Good luck tomorrow.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Thanks, man.

quotes.name: Gary
quotes.text: Sorry to hear about Donny.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah.  Well, you know, sometimes you eat the bear, and, uh.

quotes.name: The Stranger
quotes.text: Howdy do, Dude.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Oh, hey man, how are ya? I wondered if I'd see you again.

quotes.name: The Stranger
quotes.text: Wouldn't miss the semis. How things been goin'?

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Ahh, you know. Strikes and gutters, ups and downs.

quotes.name: The Stranger
quotes.text: Sure, I gotcha.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Thanks, Gary...Take care, man, I gotta get back.

quotes.name: The Stranger
quotes.text: Sure. Take it easy, Dude--I know that you will.

quotes.name: The Dude
quotes.text: Yeah man. Well, you know, the Dude abides.

quotes.name: The Stranger
quotes.text: The Dude abides.

quotes.name: The Stranger
quotes.text: I don't know about you, but I take comfort in that. It's good knowin' he's out there, the Dude, takin' her easy for all us sinners. Shoosh. I sure hope he makes The finals. Welp, that about does her, wraps her all up. Things seem to've worked out pretty good for the Dude'n Walter, and it was a purt good story, dontcha think? Made me laugh to beat the band. Parts, anyway. Course--I didn't like seein' Donny go. But then, happen to know that there's a little Lebowski on the way. I guess that's the way the whole durned human comedy keeps perpetuatin' it-self, down through the generations, westward the wagons, across the sands a time until-- aw, look at me, I'm ramblin'again. Wal, uh hope you folks enjoyed yourselves.

quotes.name: The Stranger
quotes.text: Catch ya further on down the trail.

quotes.name: The Stranger
quotes.text: ...Say friend, ya got any more a that good sarsaparilla?...
